item.title: Overgrown Tree, 8th July
item.description:
This tree is causing issues with passing high vehicles as the branches are too low and the vehicles are hitting them, anything larger than a white van will cause damage to the tree and vehicle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lansdowne Avenue, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and noisy manhole cover, 8th July
item.description:
Man he cover is loose. It rocks when cars drive over it making a very loud clanking noise. This can be heard through closed windows but in the hot weather with windows open it’s very loud. This happens every time a car goes over it and due to the street being a cut through starts very early in the morning This started ably a month ago and getting worse. Road surface at corner ( she photos) starting to erode with movement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Madeira Avenue, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large blue and pink graffiti on stairs going up to salter road, 8th July
item.description:
I noticed the issue this morning, approaching the stairs to the Russia Dock footbridge to the shipwright road bus stop. There is a large graffiti tag on the wall as you start going up the stairs to street level.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bonding Yard Walk, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped electrical equipment / water pumps, 8th July
item.description:
This belongs to Woodlands Site Services Ltd at 8 Tyers Gate. It has been requested of them several times to dispose of it and have ignored. It has been there now over a month and they appear they to have no real intention of moving it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13-56, Tyers Gate, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven ridge in road surface, 8th July
item.description:
It looks like a road mend after a cable was laid. The ridge has been deteriorating. When my bike goes over it there is a massive jolt. It’s just deep at the point a bicycle is from the curb

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): East End Road, Church End, London

item.title: Fly tipping/ Rubbish dump 8 July, 8th July
item.description:
Good Morning, It’s the 8 July and after the rubbish collection yesterday yet again someone has dumped rubbish old bits of wood in the street. No respect for the neighbourhood. Don’t you have a car to take the waste to the refuge site yourself. Utter laziness!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
